metadata.dcterms:title: Comparative genomics of the chitinase gene family in lodgepole and jack pines: contrasting responses to biotic threats and landscape level investigation of genetic differentiation
metadata.dcterms:creator: Peery, Rhiannon
metadata.dcterms:description: These data include files needed for or generated from phylogenetic, mutation rate, reciprocal best hits, and population genomics analyses.

Earth and Environmental Sciences
Medicine, Health and Life Sciences

Comparative genomics of the chitinase gene family in lodgepole and jack pines: contrasting responses to biotic threats and landscape level investigation of genetic differentiation.
